attributes.action: look into the closure of cosely baths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the closure of cosely baths is wrong.this is a place where the yongsters go to learn to swim in the dudley area and it needs keeping open by the council for the kids

rejection.details: We suggest you contact your local authority in the first instance. If you would still like to submit a petition to Downing Street please be more precise about the government action you would like taken. 'Look into' is not considered a sufficient request for action. Thanks, E-petition team.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
